website_summaries.verdict: A soothing, multifunctional diffuser with an affordable price. The best value for your money.
cons: Smaller tank (100 ml) makes it more practical as a diffuser than a humidifier

customer_reviews.title: Small but useful
customer_reviews.text: Good diffuser for a small space. I wish i had bought a bigger one now that i have this. When i have my window open the scent of oils is not as strong for obvious reason, but when the wondow is closed it is so relaxing to go to sleep to it. Sounds like a tiny little bubble bath next to me and i love the light change even though i leave it off at night bc it is really bright, when i transfer it to my bathroom and leave the light on its prettier than a candle. Oh and it came with one bottle of lavander oil. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madlena

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this Diffuser but unfortunately it is exceptionally difficult to open. It seems like it creates a vacuum seal from the moisture. I have mild arthritis which makes it painful to pry off the top over. I have had to use a letter opener several times to help break the vacuum seal. Yesterday I spilled water and oil all over my office after fighting with it to open. I have a similar diffuser that has a larger capacity that I use at home and never have this problem with it. When it is on it works great and love the colors. As a write this it isn't on because I can't get the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Runs great! Produces a very quality scent. Highly recommend using ONLY essential oils that are pure, not any chemically-created ones. I tried both just to see how it would go. The chemical ones tend to create a lot of buildup. It still works, but you'll have to clean it really thoroughly before putting something else in or it gunks it all up. The lighting options are great as well. I only wish it had a color-cycle option, but otherwise, I just tend to pick blue (my favorite) anyways. I like that there is a dim and bright option with the light as well. I'm very happy I bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: The BriteLeafs diffuser far exceeds my expectations with regards to noise level(none) mist produced was excellent disbursement o
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have purchsed many aroma therapy diffusers and have consistently found them to be noisy, and produced large droplets instead of a mist which would ruin anything they were sitting on at the time. I was looking for a new diffuser that was quiet and this product was suggested to me. The BriteLeafs diffuser far exceeds my expectations with regards to noise level(none) mist produced was excellent disbursement of scent was excellent in a 250 sq ft room. The one thing I would like is for there to be a 5 hour timer on it. Would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: R Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is simple to use and consistently works perfectly. I use it practically every night. My kids love the night light feature although I turn it off as soon as they fall asleep. I love that it doesn't take up much space on the night table and the power cord can be easily removed from the bottom of the device without unplugging it from the wall outlet to drain out old water. The power cord is long enough that I don't need to strain to plug it in while placing it anywhere on the night stand. It's small but powerful and the automatic shut off feature makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: amznaddct

customer_reviews.title: Six years later and it still works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and I loved it so much that I bought 2 more for gifts. I have now had this for almost 6 years with almost daily use and it's still working like new and without any problems. I really appreciate how you can not only change the colors but there is an option to dim each color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Pickard

customer_reviews.title: This item worked great for the first 6 months or so that we ...
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great for the first 6 months or so that we had it, but it has become difficult to open to add water, I've always used filtered water in it, so I'm not sure why it sticks. The color options are great, double as a nightlight with each color having 2 levels of brightness. I might buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bezak

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for your money, Pretty too.
customer_reviews.text: This one works well. Well worth your money.I shopped and shopped for a diffuser. Most were too expensive. I posted a question to Amazon about the timer on this one and was pleasantly surprised with the positive comments that came along with the answer to my question. This is a pretty unit that holds 100 ml of purified water, and the scent of your choice. There is a timer that goes from 1/2 hour to about 2 hours and then it automatically shuts off. It also has a light choice if you like. So use it as a night light, or just a room hi-lite. The scent is diffused gently along with a small amount of steam. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: R L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when using essential oils, if it gets on your hands, design will smudge.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful! My sister in law LOVED IT!! I'm a Massage Therapist and I bought one that had the design cover it all the way around, i loved it! Unfortunately, over time, it got oily, and the ink of the design smudged and eventually i had to take it off. It looked like nails that need to be redone as it just chips away. It looked horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this diffuser and I love it. It was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this diffuser and I love it. It was easy to set up, looks nice and puts out a steady stream of essential oils. I took my time buying a diffuser and read many reviews. This one seemed to be a hit and I'm glad I bought it. Note: because I see some people asked, each light color has a high and low setting, but I don't see that it cycles randomly through a color change mode, meaning, once you select a color, that's the color you get unless you select another. There is also the option to not have any light/color. Now my only thing is that I'll need a 2nd for another room.
customer_reviews.author: meesh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I love the timer feature
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love the timer feature. I can just put it on, and go to dream land. I love the colors, some of them are bright, but a few of them (mainly the purple and red hues) provide ambient light that allow me to drift off at ease! I love this little guy. Also, a side note, I am rather lazy, and this little guy is easy to refill each night. It comes with a small cup that you can use to refill so that you don't have to unplug, or dedicate a cup to your room that other products lack. I love it! It is great for my lazy self!
customer_reviews.author: L Lawless

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to go to my room and turn on this fantastic machine. I haven't figured out which color night ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to my diffuser! I can't wait to go to my room and turn on this fantastic machine. I haven't figured out which color night light I like the best, so I keep rotating the colors and I love the fact I can change from a bright night light to a more Suttle light. Just wished it had purple. If I could only take twenty items with me this would definitely be one of the twenty.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn Stancil

customer_reviews.title: I love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser! I put it in my living room (which is a big open room connected to my kitchen and dining room) and it is able to fill the entire room with whichever essential oil I choose. It was an added bonus that it came with some lavender essential oil. I also love the color options. It works well as a night light while it is diffusing. I want to buy more of these to put in some of the other rooms in my house. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rue23

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: * EDIT* 10/29/14 Please someone contact me! My unit isn't working properly anymore. Not putting out much vapor anymore and has become loud like there is an issue with the fan. I have taken excellent care of it and followed all instructions. Feeling a little heartbroken as I use this for bedtime and now it's making a loud noise and vapor has declined;-( Have had this for a few days now and so far so good! Seems to be good quality and puts out a nice amount of vapor and scent. Only time will tell if it continues to be this fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: I really like this diffuser a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser a lot! The best feature is the timer. I have already had two people ask me about mine unit, which I have in our living area, and they are going to get one. The quantity of mist is good but I hope a larger unit is made so I get more a mist. It just seems a little small for our large room but this would be perfect for bedrooms....maybe I should just get more units? I would purchase again; the timer is a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Completely broken
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser was dysfunctional. It would only work part of the time, and now it does not work at all. I followed the instructions, but most of the time I could not see a stream of vapor coming from the spout. Now, the lid is completely stuck closed, and I cannot budge it no matter how hard I try. It is completely broken. I am very disappointed, and I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I waited a while to write a review
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I waited a while to write a review. At first, I loved this product. It's beautiful, and it puts out a good amount of mist for as small as it is. But the thing that makes it so pretty-- the black vine design-- doesn't hold up to water. If it gets wet and you try to wipe it off, you end up smearing the design. The fill lines on the inside have also worn off, so you can't see them anymore. If this was a cheap product, I wouldn't be surprised, or even upset. But for $50, I was expecting quality, and I didn't get it. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Grier Fehrenbach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for my desk at work. I had tried a different one and sent it back. This one fits perfectly on my desk and is just what I need. I tend to run my diffuser in the mornings. If it is a really rough day or if there have been a lot of folks sick, I run it all day. With the smaller tank this one had, I can change the oil for the afternoon if I want. Love it! I rarely use the lights but it is kind of fun whenever I do.
customer_reviews.author: PAN66

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can adjust different colors and brightness
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is really stunning! I like that you can adjust different colors and brightness. The diffuser itself works really well and you can choose how long you want it on. I gave it only 4 stars because the directions for setting the timing was confusing and I originally thought it was defected. The directions state to hold the button for 3 seconds and to continue pressing for longer periods. Actually, you press for 3 seconds, then let go and press once for each setting change. Otherwise I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debi W.

customer_reviews.title: Marvelously Compact and Effective!!
customer_reviews.text: This very small unit puts out an amazing mist to fill an entire bedroom. I have had this for four days now and used it for three consecutive nights. Each of those nights I have had the best sleep I can remember in weeks. Would recommend this to anyone who uses essential oils for aromatherapy or for health and wellness. It's quiet operation, multiple user-determined settings, and compact design make it ideal for just about any space. I will be getting another one to use in my office area and one for my daughter, too!
customer_reviews.author: Justia

customer_reviews.title: nice little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait for this to arrive and was very pleased with it! The oil it came with is a very soothing scent, but I also brought a set of other oils to use with it. It is very easy to use. The different lights are nice each colour has a different setting. The mist is very nice and diffuses the scent well. I am using it in my bedroom and it fills the room. I looked at many diffusers but needed one that my kitties couldn't get into and this fit the bill. Good diffuser at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this diffuser to work -- reasonable price ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this diffuser to work -- reasonable price and it is very cute. However, opened it up, followed all the directions and used it for a few hours the evening after a got it. By the next day (about 24 hours after receiving it) it completely stopped working. I'm giving it two stars because I'm thankful that amazon did e-mail me a return shipping label and gave me a full refund back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I bought it to take to work and put on my desk. I also purchased some essential oils to use with it. It works great. I put it close enough to get some of the benefits of the humidifier and get the added benefit of the wonderful aroma of the oils. I also enjoy the "mood" lighting. Several of my coworkers have come by and commented on how much they like it and want one. Thanks for this super item
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: If You're Looking for a Candle Alternative- This is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a bit larger. The sleek design is nice and it does look great even when not lit up, but it is too small and does not produce a strong aroma. It's great for very small rooms- or small office spaces. It is difficult to pull the base off- as is it quite tight which makes using & cleaning it quite difficult. I purchased one for my mother and she had difficulty opening (twisting) the top but she really enjoys the diffuser and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: KFlagg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great essential oil machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 4 other essential oil diffusers and this one was the charm! Not only does it do a good job of providing a steady stream of oil-diffused steam, but it looks so pretty while doing so. The amount of oil that I use is less than the previous brands that I tried! The light fixture not only has different beautiful colors you can choose to have off or on during operation, but you can choose between a low-light or bright-light for each one!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett O

customer_reviews.title: This works and looks very nice. It puts out a lot of mist
customer_reviews.text: This works and looks very nice. It puts out a lot of mist, but not much fragrance. I doubled the amount of oil drops recommended and still did not get very much scent. I was really disappointed. My reeds in a bottle have as much fragrance as this unit. I haven't even had this a month yet and it is already not working.
customer_reviews.author: loriv

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little diffuser/humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying experimenting with various new essential oils with this wonderful diffuser/humidifier. It works very well - it emits a good amount of steam considering the size of the unit and diffuses it nicely throughout my bedroom. I was, however, hoping that the colors would morph (like from blue to green, etc.) but it only allows you to select a color that you like. The light blue makes a nice night light and the auto turn off option is great, so I can go to sleep without having to manually turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moore

customer_reviews.title: The different light options are soothing and can be changed easily. There are different timing options for the diffuser ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! The different light options are soothing and can be changed easily. There are different timing options for the diffuser and very easily set. I use in my office at work and the diffused oils aren't overwhelming. It's easily filled and lasts as long as the manufacturer states. Plugs in for power which is nice so no batteries are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny Duchene

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a little while
customer_reviews.text: It works but after have it for about a month the design started rubbing off at the slightest touch
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon after looking at several diffuser types/prices. The BriteLeafs 2-in-2 Ultrasonic Aroma Diffuser/Humidifier works just fine. I use it in my child's bedroom with essential oils to help with his asthma in addition to his daiiy breathing treatments. He really likes the light because there are color options. I especially like that you can set it for 30 minutes up to 3 hours and it will automatically shut off. I would hightly recommend this product for anyone wanting to diffuse essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: P. COOK

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice little diffuser for a smller space
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little diffuser for a smller space. Soft steam of mist. Smaller water capacity. Great choice of lights. it does have a few times to choose from, but I forget how to choose the length of time (not apparent as it has one on off button that you hold for a couple seconds to turn on) and one button to select lights. It works fine.I need a stronger mister and larger capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Terryg

customer_reviews.title: pretty and powerful
customer_reviews.text: the diffuser looks fantastic and it is more powerful than any other diffuser that I own besides my nebulizer, it puts out a very good mist witch means more scent in the air I love it so far just hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: nutter1

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser! it has many good features. For starters, it has 4 time settings, so that it will shut of automatically at the appointed time. If it runs out of water first, it will shut off then as well. It's compact and attractive, and has many different colored light settings if you wanted to use it as a night light, or just as a mood setter. It runs very quietly and diffuses essential oils through a good sized room. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: lag308

customer_reviews.title: Great way to go to sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. The colors are nice. It does a good job of diffusing the oils. I run it for about an hour, starting just before I go to bed. I go to sleep with the wonderful smells from my essential oils. It turns off at the appropriate time and doesn't run all night. I've started putting just enough water in when I go to bed and just enough oil. It seems to be more fragrant than if I use too much water and try to run the same water on several nights.
customer_reviews.author: WindyDay

customer_reviews.title: Pros- Lovely to look at- the colors are beautiful The humidifier works great
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Lovely to look at- the colors are beautiful The humidifier works great. It's small and Cons- I have to refill it every 3 hours the flower pattern is rubbing off I wish it had a setting for 6 hours Over all, for the price, it's nice. I will try and find a fine point art pen to redo the floral pattern. I think it's the oil that is taking it off. Watch where you put your hands
customer_reviews.author: Deja Blu

customer_reviews.title: Nice diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described and was delivered fast as promised. It is easy to assemble and works great. It filled up my room with the fragrance very fast and the lights effect is really nice. Just the indicator lines for measuring how much water you're pouring in the container got wipped off very quickly, and also the dots that need to match to know if you're closing the lid correctly. But it is a good product in general.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Updated review!!!! Excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May. We've been super busy and only have had the opportunity to use this 3 times. I went to fill it brith oils tonite and the light comes on but the mist does not work. Very expensive and disappointing to get only 3 uses out of this. When it worked it was very nice!!! UPDATE! I emailed the company and had a response back almost immediately. I was given directions on how yo clean the unit and it worked perfectly!! I would buy from this seller again. Even though my purchase was 5 months ago they stood behind the product! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Durability might be an issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in February and was pretty satisfied with it up until about two weeks ago when water started leaking out of the diffuser when I had it on. At first I thought I was putting too much water in it, but it wasn't. I don't think I did anything unreasonable to break this diffuser (I mean you leave it alone while it works.. it's hard to break it) Now I have to put 4 layers of paper-towel underneath it if I want to use this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kwang Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, outstanding design bends into room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, outstanding design bends into room, the output mist is great readily fills a room, the different light colors and brightness settings set the mode of a room. Customer service via e-mail is fantastic, they answered a questions even on a holiday weekend. Really like and enjoy this diffuser, will be purchasing additional units for every level of our house, one for my office at work, and as gifts for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: RADAR

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: This aroma diffuser works great, is very attractive, and is easy to operate. I just add water and 8-10 drops of my favorite essential oil and my whole house smells great. I can set it for 30, 60,120, or 180 minutes and it will shut off automatically. There are different colored light settings, too. I looked at all the different diffusers on Amazon and chose this one based on reviews and price, and I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieT

customer_reviews.title: Like that the light has different color options as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells up a small room very quickly with only a couple drops of oil. Filled to max it will last about 4 hours. Like that the light has different color options as well as two brightness settings. Wish it had an intermittent mode so it would last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Good Diffuser at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is our first diffuser to use with essential oils. It works exactly as advertised. It would be a five if the automatic shut-off ran on smaller increments (say 15 minutes instead of units of 30), as some oils are recommended for diffusion at 10 minutes at a time (Thieves, for instance). The light adds a very nice ambient effect in an otherwise dark room. Our living room is quite large and this diffuser has sufficient output to fill it. Very satisfied essential oils diffusion beginners :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..........
customer_reviews.text: So far, after two uses, I'm pleased with this diffuser. The ability to change the lighting is so nice and the stream of air coming from the device is sufficient to pleasantly scent the air. The only complaint I have is with the scent of the oil that accompanied the diffuser. I smells a little off -- not what I'm used to with pure essential oils. That said, I view the oil as a bonus and not something that would influence my review of the diffuser. At this juncture, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pooky

customer_reviews.title: Ultrasonic Aroma Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: My whole house benefits from the Great smells coming from my diffuser. Also, the timing mechanism works like a dream. I'm very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so pretty and it adds to your decor
customer_reviews.text: Why not? It's so pretty and it adds to your decor! I ordered this for a friend..her first diffuser. She's in love with it! Diffusers are great for so many reasons....colds, flu, restlessness at night, energy, focus, and on and on :)
customer_reviews.author: Keri Rydin

customer_reviews.title: Freakin love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little guy for a few years now. I love it! I have terrible allergies and I like to breathe in essential oils to help clear sinuses. It's amazing. Still works like a charm, even though I have to snap in the top part of the piece that lifts off. It's annoying but I love the diffuser. And you can change the color. Bonus
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Like for first diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser is nice. We use it lights off mostly. I use 3-6 drops of EO. I find 8 to be overwhelming. Make sure you place on a surface that the oils or moisture will not damage as it does leave a residue. I also threw the oil they send away as it gave me headaches. Not a good quality oil.
customer_reviews.author: sunset

customer_reviews.title: I spent a long time trying to find the perfect diffuser for my essential oils journey
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time trying to find the perfect diffuser for my essential oils journey. After months of every night (with many daytime uses also) usage, I happily recommend this diffuser. My kids beg for it in their rooms enough that I'm considering buying them their own just so I don't have to go through the hassle of relocating it every night after it has helped them get to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product. I own three different diffusers but this one is my favorite. I have it in my room and turn it on at night and set the timer on it and I sleep like a baby. It is easy to open and fill with water and oils and I love that it has a timer so that I don't have to worry about it just running until it runs out of water. I can set it from a 1/2 hour to 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: It doesn`t produce enough mist, I put it 2-3ft ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn`t produce enough mist,I put it 2-3ft away on dresser,shut the door & put it on for 3 hrs and I still don`t smell it to much,feel no difference & the mist doesn`t come out very strong,I use a coconut carrier highly rated on amazon.Do you think I need to try another diffuser since the mist coming out is so weak?Please contact me ASAP or I may have to return it.Bruce Stadtler
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Works good...took a little time to hold the button right amount of time to get it to go on to other settings but after doing it a few times not hard just user adjustment. (me in otherwords)....I like that can have light on or off if on you can tell where water level is which nice I realize it does shut off on own if runs out but can tell how close it is to running out. Good product for price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: love mystery

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't serve the purpose at all :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diffuser to help with my sinus problems,allergy and also for a peaceful sleep at night.Honestly it didn't help. It made my nostrils go dry and above all i don't smell the fragrance in the room at all,not even a bit.Tried with different kinds of oils and different brands too. The diffusing is not so good and didn't serve the purpose.Bought this with lot of hope and now Very disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great and my boys loving choosing the different colors each ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great and my boys loving choosing the different colors each night. There are several time settings, which is also great. My only complaint is that the plug is underneath the diffuser, meaning you have to plug it back in after you have filled with water, so you have to be careful not to spill as you are looking underneath to find the plug in. It would've been a better design to plug in from the side.
customer_reviews.author: LexingtonMommy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine. I bought this one because I read ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine. I bought this one because I read it was one of the best ones this year and I'm impressed. Before this I bought the Sparoom brand at Target and you had to put your nose up to it to smell anything. I love how Brite-Leafs is not too expensive, yet has good features like the light, it doubles as a humidifier and the it has a timer. Plus, it's great that it already comes with Lavender essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Gaule

customer_reviews.title: use more EO for a stronger scent
customer_reviews.text: Im so confused by the negative reviews this has received. I LOVE IT! I haven't had a problem with it in the 2weeks I've had it. After running it for a little while it scents my entire second floor. No more candles for this lady. Considering buying both Children their own for their rooms. I would suggest adding more EO to the water for those not getting enough scent. I use the suggested 20 drops for my diffuser as suggested by aromaweb and it works like a charm and that's been with nightly use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and works like a charm. I use this in my class room to diffuse essential oils throughout the day. At first my students were concerned to see "steam" rising from my desk in the corner, but now it's a guessing game about what I've diffused throughout the day, and if I haven't diffused anything the ask me to turn on the "mini good smelling humidifier." Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Archlady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member. She loves it! A friend also has one and she loves hers too. Compared to others on the market, the unit is very pretty. So far, the diffuser works very well. I will say that it is not made for very large areas but, if you are using it in a normal sized room, I think you will be very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: An other item that had potential if it only worked right. 1) It is plastic but, looks O.K.. 2) The lights work when it is running. 3) It runs poorly for only three hours and doesn't disperse oils. (Which is the reason I got it!) Yes, I am using pure high quality oils. I was running it in a small bedroom. I will be trying to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever purchused
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to remove the top and when I did I filled it with water and the oil and it leaked all over. The hot pad I had under it, was soaking wet and weighed 3 inches and leaked onto the floor. Very frustrated. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyAunt

customer_reviews.title: reservoir not sealed well to keep components dry
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first couple days and then the mist slowly came less and less till there was nothing. I took the whole thing apart and found that water was leaking in from the disk at the bottom of the reservoir because it's not sealed. It just sits inside a rubber ring. I dried everything off and it's working again. I'm hoping this isn't going to be a regular issue .
customer_reviews.author: C. Willard

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my bedroom, i personally live with a lot of pain and my immune system is compromised so i run nature's Shield and deep blue. When Husband home at night i add lavender and peppermint to help him sleep. I love it. It's small enough that I'm excited to take out with me on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou Withrow

customer_reviews.title: Love this Diffuser !!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this diffuser. I loved it so much I got my mom one and she loves her's as well. I love the lighting options, the timer options, the amount of steam it puts out, soft very soft "white noise" kinda of sound it permeates, you barely notice it. Great Product !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Bellomo

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance
customer_reviews.text: I bought two units and after less that ONE week, one is not working. Bummed I don't have the box to return it. Hoping amazon will let me return for exchange. Now the second unit is broke a day later. Not a happy customer. Update: units were working fine, great customer service. However, I now have one unit that isn't working. Can someone please contact me? :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Gingrich

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot at first
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a while now and use it daily. I liked it a lot at first, but do not find it user friendly. You cannot see the water line on the outside, so putting the water in via the water cup provided is useless. The cover sticks, making twisting it off to put the water in difficult. The cover needs to come off to put the oil in. I am looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: bostonstrong

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month, using it almost daily, if not multiple times a day. I love the light feature, it gives just a little ambiance. The diffuser integrates the oil smell into my small living room. Would love to purchase one for my office and bedroom next. Only complaint is I wish it held more water at a time, but the water it does hold will usually last 4-6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: nursetraveler

customer_reviews.title: I really like this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser. I have two, one for home and one for the office. It would be five stars except a little piece inside (not sure what it's called) tend to fall out when you take the cover off. Otherwise, great diffuser!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a bridal shower gift thinking the bride would like it. As it turns out, the groom has repeatedly told me that it's the "best gift ever"!!! I ended up buying one for myself and I love it, too! I put it in my office at work. I turn it on every morning and it makes everything smell so good!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser, but broken oil bottle with no oil
customer_reviews.text: So far, I quite like the diffuser itself. Easy to use, puts out a good amount, and seems to diffuse the oils quite well. The reason for taking one star off - I went to open the lavender oil that came with the diffuser, and the bottle had a BIG chunk of glass missing right where the screw top goes on, and there was NO oil left in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen G

customer_reviews.title: Co-workers actually enjoy the color changing light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my desk at work. Quiet and compact. Doesn't put out tons of mist, so a can keep it on my desk. Co-workers actually enjoy the color changing light. Way to bright for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier with lovely light options and several timer settings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9-year-old grandson who has asthma. He loves it (and so do I)! In face, I plan to purchase one for myself to have in my bedroom. This diffuser makes a gentle stream of humidified essential oils. It changes colors, which is cool. And it works on several timer settings with an auto-shutoff when the unit gets low on water. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: stevesgurl

customer_reviews.title: Limitted use. Worked well when first got. Stored safely for summer and now doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year in August. Used for the fall and winter but stored it during the spring/summer. I took it out to use and it does not work! The light works but there is no mist. Not sure why. Used to love it, but now not so happy with it. It's going in the trash. BEWARE.. Look at warrantee time is only 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: LynnW

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It came in the nick of time 2 days ago, a little early my 1&2 yr old grandchildren were here, we all had sore throats, it really helps. They went he healthly and happy today ' I'm using it in my room tonight. Bonus w/ the light strings, purple isy favorite, it's so peaceful. Using the correct oils it smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cheaper model so I was worried it wouldn't hold up to the test of time, but I've had mine for about 6 months now and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The Top Keeps Getting Stuck after Use
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use it and try refilling, it seems like the top almost gets glued on. I banged it to get it open once hoping that would loosen everything up but it is really hard to take the top back off. I like the design and would give it a 5 if the top would come of as easily as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J Perko

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my room and i am missing the inner piece that goes inside. I recently found this out because i bought one for my daughter and she has it. So a little disappointed. Also the writing on the side for max fill line came off. So i never know if i am filling it too much I dont think i would purchase again or give this diffuser high remarks
customer_reviews.author: Mareasa

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel as bad buying new one
customer_reviews.text: It gets tacky on inside after awhile with using oils. Trying vinegar to clean with no success. Lavender and peppermint what usually was in it. More economically than buying $100 ones and they do the same. I don't feel as bad buying new one. Light still works great. My son uses as night light.
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is working well. I use distilled water to enable it to last. I appreciate the number of light, color-settings; and it even leaves a soft glow when not in a color mode. I had bought a water bottle mini humidifier; unfortunately, it rusted and quit working after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Val Lee

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 7 months - with daily use
customer_reviews.text: It's only been about 30 days, but so far so good, love the little unit. Perfect for a small bedroom or bathroom, not really suitable for large rooms if you want a lasting aroma without sitting right next to the unit. Maybe if you got two it would be good for a larger room. Would definitely recommend for its price! UPDATE: So it's been 7 months and the unit no longer works - the lights come on and it sounds like its working, but it no longer diffuses - the same amount of water will be in the unit for days. I guess it can be used as a really expensive night light. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Tami Rymarz

customer_reviews.title: I still insist that this is one of the best ever. I went back to the seller and ...
customer_reviews.text: With the numerous diffusers I've had, I still insist that this is one of the best ever. I went back to the seller and bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Kat~

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easily fits onto the table in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easily fits onto the table in my bedroom. Makes a nice mists and it very easy to clean. Con: I would prefer that it had an option to run until the water is all gone. Mine, works for the entire time on the longest setting however it does not use up all the water - only a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: E. Giles

customer_reviews.title: great product. i have one in my office another ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. i have one in my office another one at home and they both work wonderfully. it does what it says it is going to do. I highly recommend this product to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. So far so good. For some reason I assumed they would be bigger in size than they are...but I have been pleasantly surprised at their ability to perform. They are 3in around x 5in tall and can run for up to 180 minutes with a 100ml of water. I compared mist output side by side with a youngliving bamboo diffuser ([...]) and found that although the bamboo diffuser is twice as large and has slightly more mist output, this diffuser is sufficient for a small room & bedside table, desk area, kitchen and I even run mine in the living room on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: fetherheth

customer_reviews.title: yes it a good little defuser
customer_reviews.text: yes it a good little defuser , but i have to turn it on about 5 times a day because it holds very little water and only goes about 45 minuets at a time !
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: I love this Diffuser!!
customer_reviews.text: This Diffuser is amazing! It is well worth the money! My house smells so wonderful I used 4 drops or Peppermint Essential oils and 2 drops of the Lavender Essential Oil that came with it and wow!! I love it!! I like the way you can change the colors of the light from a dark red to a lighter red, Blue, Green...It is a great product! I recommend it highly! I told my Mom about it and she is going to buy one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Yvie

customer_reviews.title: Question about light setting?
customer_reviews.text: I just got this a few days ago and I've only used it three times. It works great, lots of mist, great look, great smell. My only question is the first time I turned it on it was cycling through the light colors and that setting was so pretty. Now it seems like that setting is gone and you can only choose one color at a time, dim or bright options for each color, but no changing colors. Am I missing something? If that was working I would definitely give the product 5 stars so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Sensational Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This Diffuser works great. Had trouble with other ones, but this works flawless. Very easy to start, great colors, timer, etc. All the bells and whistles you need. Haven't had it very long, so don't know how it will hold up, but fantastic so far. Smallish unit with a great output of oils and also a humidifier, WOW buy it, if in doubt, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love so many things about thus diffuser/humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Love so many things about thus diffuser/humidifier, the size, it works well, there is a separate switch for the lights so if you choose to not use the lights when you go to bed you don't have a glow that would show in a dark room, and it is compact. I ordered another to use downstairs since the first one was for my bedroom. The price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiepoo007

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and used it once and it worked wonderful. My boss was stressed out one day so I took it to her to try and she used it almost daily in her office and loved it. its small, pretty and works well. It also makes a great gift :)
customer_reviews.author: D Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser because of its size and for the fact that you have the option of turning the light on or off. This company has amazing customer service. My first diffuser started working improperly after a month and the company contacted me to send a replacement even though my return window had expired. My replacement unit works perfect & I am using it daily. I would not hesitate to buy from this merchant again because they completely back what they sell and desire to have satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser
customer_reviews.text: For the price works great! Have been using it at night with lavender oil for sleeping and also when doing massage therapy. Very pleased with the results. Love the different settings and can't imagine why you would want to pay for some of the high priced ones when this works every bit as good. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Soma Day

customer_reviews.title: Small, But gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is UNBEATABLE for the price. Very good quality. Almost nightly use, it still puts out a strong flow. I like the 4 settings for timer and auto shut-off. It also lights up or not in different color choices (if you like that). I love the fact that it arrived SUPER FAST! So far VERY pleased! It stands up to any of the ( much) more expensive diffusers.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser worked great for awhile. It was used about once every two weeks. Then one evening it was filled and started and when I came back into the room it had leaked all over the bookcase including into electronics on an adjoining shelf. I can not return it since it has been too long since the purchase date (10 1/2 months ago). I could not recommend this diffuser
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I used it for a couple of times and the next thing I noticed is that it stopped working because the lid would not screw back in place. Colors were too plain and did not change automatically. Too much money for a poor quality diffuser. I would not recommend this product to anyone also because their customer service is virtually non existent. There is no phone for you to call and they do not respond to your email. I used this product for just one week and I did not get my money back. Worst company ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cleo B

customer_reviews.title: Good diffuser at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser works very well. I have been running it in the evenings for about a week now. It puts out a good steady stream of diffused essential oil. I do not use the colorful light, which can be turned on or off. This was a reasonable price and seems to work like a charm. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in the mountains

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the BriteLeafs diffuser. I use it almost every night with different essential oils, depending on my needs. I love the fact that I can change the color of the light to make it dimmer for sleeping. The diffuser puts out a sufficient volume of steam to make the vapors beneficial in an average size bedroom. I am very pleased with my purchase and will definitely recommend it to anyone who asks.
customer_reviews.author: scarybooklover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser! It's pretty and works great! * Update - I received this on August 10th and it worked great. However, it is now September 9th and it no longer works! One month and it no longer mists! Disappointed! Went from 5 stars down to 1
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this. This is the 3rd one I buy and its only cause I moved to a bigger space and wanted one for the other side of the office too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Delgado

customer_reviews.title: The steam action works quickly but the bubbling of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The steam action works quickly but the bubbling of the water can be heard. The biggest problem is trying to remove the lid to fill the diffuser. It is extremely difficult, so we do not lock the lid on so we can use it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Christoff

customer_reviews.title: This works great. I think I need a larger one for ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I think I need a larger one for my living room. I keep this on the kitchen counter and diffuse lemon while I do dishes. Makes the job less cumbersome
customer_reviews.author: MommaSR

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product to help with my anxiety. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with my anxiety. I find that I fall asleep much easier with the subtle scent this diffuser emits. I have only had it for two weeks and don't use it every night but, so far, the product is exactly as described. (And, I didn't have a problem with adjusting the timer as some reviewers noted.)
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: BriteLeafs 2-in-1 Ultrasonic Aroma Diffuser Ultrasonic Humidifier - 4 Timer Settings & 6 Color Light Changes + Free 10ml Aromatherapy Essential Oil (Lavender)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis ultrasonic aromatherapy diffuser with 2.4 million ultrasonic vibrations per second (the highest ultrasonic vibration frequency in the market) is a state-of-the-art aromatherapy system. Product Features: * Create instant relaxing aromatherapy by adding essential oils * 6 soothing color lights to choose * Can be used as a ultrasonic humidifier * Advanced ultrasonic diffusing technology with auto-shut off when water level is low * 4 Timer settings: Continue On, 180 minutes, 120 minutes and 60 minutes * High vibration frequency: 2.4 Mhz * Whisper-quiet ultrasonic operation * Provides moisture for Dry Cough, Sinus Irritation, Dry Skin * High capacity water tank: 100ml * Perfect for room up to 220 sq. ft. * Easy to clean
feature_bullets: 2019 New Improved Version with stronger mist and more efficient essential oil breakdown
2-in-1 ultrasonic aroma diffuser humidifier creates instant relaxing aromatherapy by adding essential oils (10ml lavender essential oil included)

Whisper-quiet ultrasonic operation, Advanced ultrasonic diffusing technology with auto-shut off when water level is low, 4 Timer settings: Continue On, 180 minutes, 120 minutes and 60 minutes. 6 soothing color lights to choose
Humidifier provides moisture for Dry Cough, Sinus Irritation, Dry Skin
2019 New Improved Version with stronger mist and more efficient essential oil breakdown, High capacity water tank: 100ml, Perfect for room up to 220 sq. ft. Compact size: 5.5"(H)x3.2"(W)
